amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute establishes the conditions under which Alaskan North Slope oil may be exported.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of July 21, 1995, to make minor technical and conforming changes to the original text.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Young (AK).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
